1.name: Easy
1.description: No Propuh tokens at the start

2.name: Normal
2.description: One Propuh token in the bed at the start

3.name: Hard
3.description: One Propuh token on each location at the start

4.name: Random
4.description: Up to the maximum of Propuh tokens on each location, according to the random difficulty cards

1.name: 1 (easy)
1.description: Each random difficulty card places 1 or 2 tokens on one location

2.name: 2 (normal)
2.description: Each random difficulty card places 1 or 2 tokens on one location

3.name: 3 (hard)
3.description: Each random difficulty card places 1 or 2 tokens on one location

4.name: 4 (impossible?!)
4.description: Each random difficulty card places 1 or 2 tokens on one location
